name: Memory Remake (Demo)
description:
Haruna has known her friends all her life. She's grown up in the same part of town, lived in the same bedroom, and attended the same school for as long as she can remember. But when she's forced to cut ties and move – to a new house and a new school – she must quickly adapt to save the life she's known.

Play as Haruna and work to balance your old life with the new. Is it possible to keep old friends when you're not in the same school as them? Is it too hard to gain new friends as a stranger in an unfamiliar school? Who do you fall in love with – your childhood friend or the new flame that catches your eye?

Join clubs, hang out and call friends, and remake your memories.
